name: EthereumDaily
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
A daily new briefing covering the latest in Ethereum. Tune in for updates about the world's second largest cryptocurrency, covering decentralized finance, blockchain technology, web3 infrastructure, NFTs, governance, and security.

Subscribe to our newsletter: https://blog.ether.fm
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
